thread.title: Megan McKenna edits Instagram snap after trolls accuse her of having extra toes
thread.title_full: Megan McKenna edits Instagram snap after trolls accuse her of having extra toes

author: Vicki Newman
title: Megan McKenna edits Instagram snap after trolls accuse her of having extra toes
text:
Megan McKenna edits Instagram snap after trolls accuse her of having extra toes The TOWIE babe was met with harsh comments when she uploaded a new picture Share Trolls say it looks like Megan McKenna has six toes on this pic (Photo: Instagram / megan_mckenna_) Share Get celebs   
Megan McKenna edited a picture to crop out her toes after cruel trolls accused her of having some extra appendages. 
The TOWIE babe took to Instagram to show fans what she was wearing for her date night with boyfriend Pete Wicks. 
However, the brunette beauty perhaps didn't get the response she was expecting. 
In the photo, Megan, 24, is sat up on the backrest of a settee, wearing black skinny trousers with a laced-up detail on the front, a strappy red top and a leather jacket, complete with spikes draped around her shoulders. Read More TOWIE's Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks redo their first date after putting year of drama behind them Megan showed off what she was wearing for date night - but does she have an extra toe? (Photo: Instagram / megan_mckenna_) 
Her hair sits on top of her head in a huge bun and she's playfully holding a pair of sunglasses in her mouth. 
Megan has her bare feet up on the settee and stares into the camera lens with a seductive gaze, but that's not what her followers noticed about the picture. 
A string of trolls pointed out that Megan appears to have six toes on one foot. 
"Only here to count toes," wrote one follower. 
Another commented: "12 toesies" [sic]. 
But the former Celebrity Big Brother housemate hit back at the haters, sharing a close up of her feet and pointing out that she actually has five toes on each foot. 
However, she later deleted the picture and edited the original snap to crop out her feet. Read More Megan later cropped the pic (Photo: Instagram / megan_mckenna_) 
The haters didn't let it go though. 
One wrote: "I see she edited the Pic". 
"Lol she cropped out her toes," said another. 
And another posted: "Lmfao her foot's cut out bc the pic is photoshopped and she has 6 toes in it" [sic] 
Some of Megan's fans jumped to her defence, saying that even if the star did have six toes, it was no reason to be mean. 
One said: "You're gorgeous and have a rocking attitude. F**k those hating lowlife trash bums. They're miserable with their pathetic lives and unattractive looks. Even if you did have a sixth toe or even more so what. You're still better than that trash on your worst day. At the end of the day you are an accomplished somebody, and they are non factors." Megan is dating TOWIE co-star Pete Wicks (Photo: Rex Features) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
